name: Burger Burger: Hamburger Simulation
overview: Burger Burger is a tycoon style game in which you can try to build a burger empire. In the game you can create your own menus and different kind of recipes using differents ingredients. You can also modify the prices of your menus. The game features 3 difficulty levels: - Easy - Normal - Hard At the beginning of the game the player can choose the type of shop, the uniforms color of his employees, the logo and the name of the restaurant. During the game the player has to be specially dedicated in his menu and in his prices, the game features a lot of different possible recipes to make, since the player can choose whatever he wants to be in his different burgers and which meals he wants to be in his menus. Every year there is a ceremony to give the Best Sales prize and the Best Burger of the Year prize. So now is up for the player to become the best and win all the prizes.
